headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.text: The achievement of a $1 trillion market cap by LLY highlights the growing confidence in the healthcare sector, particularly among small- and mid-cap companies. Investors may be shifting their focus to these smaller entities as they seek value in a rapidly evolving market. This trend could indicate an overall bullish sentiment towards healthcare investments.
